snippet: The study found more psychological and social problems among young adults from broken homes who had a gay parent.
abstract: Mark Regnerus study in journal Social Science Research finds that young adults from broken homes in which a parent had been involved in a same-sex relationship reported modestly more psychological and social problems in their current lives than peers from other families that had experienced divorce and other disruptions.
lead_paragraph: The study found more psychological and social problems among young adults from broken homes who had a gay parent.

headline.seo: Study Examines Effect of Having a Gay Parent
headline.main: Debate on a Study Examining Gay Parents
headline.print_headline: Debate On a Study Examining Gay Parents
